spells.name: Adjustable Disguise
spells.description: As disguise self, but you can change the disguise as a swift action.

spells.name: Align Weapon, Communal
spells.description: As align weapon, but you can divide the duration among weapons touched.

spells.name: Mantle of Calm
spells.description: Neutralize the rage effects of those who have attacked you.

spells.name: Shield of Fortification
spells.description: Target gains a 50% chance to treat critical hits and sneak attacks as normal hits.

spells.name: Stunning Barrier, Greater
spells.description: Magical field grants a +2 bonus to AC and on saves, and stuns multiple creatures attacking you.
